declaration: using simple_vertex_shader = class static_shader<[path to file], input_shader<float2, type_value_pair<float2, 0>>>;
briefDescription: A simple input-shader that passes the vertices along with little modifications.
detailedDescription:
A simple input-shader that adds its float2-field to every vertex, but otherwise simply passes along the input-vertices.
Requires the resource-folder from Graphics.Core to be included with the executable.
